alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex and north central Middlesex Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunstable, or near Nashua, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Andover, Dracut, North Andover, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Georgetown, Boxford, Groveland and Dunstable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
